TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_paluma, title = paluma, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/paluma} }

S.FORM: (kamu hu hulam:種) paluma kaku tu paza' i nu zikuzan nu luma'. 我在我家後院種香蕉. milihiza kita ci inaan paluma tu lami' i palami'an. .
(kamo ho holam:種) paloma kako to paza' i no zikozan no loma'. 我在我家後院種香蕉. milihiza kita ci inaan paloma to lami' i palami'an. .
